backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining Event type and CRUD operations (create, get, update, delete, getAllEvents) with in-memory Map storage and date/time-based sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (Home screen, calendar views, event CRUD, settings) to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system defining CSS variables for light and dark themes including primary, secondary, muted, destructive, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with mobile-optimized meta tags, PWA capabilities, theme color configuration, and app icon references.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with six routes (Home, Calendar, AddEvent, EventDetails, EventEdit, Settings), ThemeProvider, Toaster, and notification hook initialization.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Home, Calendar, Add, Settings) using Lucide icons and active state highlighting based on current route.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable AlertDialog component for confirmations with customizable title, description, action buttons, and loading state support.
frontend/src/components/DailyView.tsx: Daily calendar view displaying all events for selected date in chronological order with day navigation controls, today indicator, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/EventForm.tsx: A reusable form component for creating and editing events with fields for title, description, date, time, and reminder toggle, including validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: A layout wrapper component that provides consistent page structure with a container, padding, and a bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyView.tsx: Displays a calendar month grid with navigation controls, highlights days with events, and shows a list of events for the selected date.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyView.tsx: Displays a week view with navigation controls, showing each day as a card with its events sorted by time, highlighting the current day.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: Provides theme context for light/dark mode switching with localStorage persistence and system preference detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication, automatically recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality with AuthClient integration and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Monitors events and triggers browser notifications 15 minutes before events with reminders enabled, requesting permission if needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on events (get all, get one, create, update, delete) using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a blue/purple color theme for both light and dark modes, plus base styles and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AddEvent.tsx: Page component for creating new events using EventForm, handles submission with createEvent mutation and navigates to home on success.
frontend/src/pages/Calendar.tsx: Calendar page with tabbed interface switching between monthly, weekly, and daily views, managing selected date state.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetails.tsx: Event details page displaying full event information with edit and delete actions, includes confirmation dialog for deletion.
frontend/src/pages/EventEdit.tsx: Event editing page that loads existing event data and uses EventForm to handle updates via updateEvent mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home dashboard showing greeting, today's event count, and a sorted list of today's events with time-based formatting.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page with toggles for dark mode theme and browser notification permissions, plus placeholder for cloud sync feature.
frontend/src/utils/notificationHelpers.t: Utility functions for checking and requesting notification permissions, showing event notifications, and calculating time until events.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, dark mode support, custom animations (accordion, fade-in), safe area spacing, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document defining a mobile Calendar App with React/TypeScript frontend, Motoko backend on Internet Computer, featuring daily/weekly/monthly views, event management, reminders, dark/light mode, and bottom navigation with blue/white/purple theme.
